#summary How to release a new version of Rainpress
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy,Phase-Implementation,Phase-Support

= Things to do before releasing =

  * Make sure that there are no open bugs for the upcoming release
  * Make sure all unit-tests run without a problem

= Things to do while releasing =
 
 * Build a zip- and a 7z-archive of Schoorbs -> `rake release`
 * Upload those packages
 * Announce on http://xhochy.org/en
 * Announce on [https://launchpad.net/schoorbs/+announce Launchpad]
 * Announce on [http://groups.google.com/group/xy-announce XhochY Announce]
 * Announce on [http://groups.google.com/group/schoorbs-general-discussion Schoorbs general discussion]
 * Announce on Freshmeat and add this release
